course.subject: FINA
course.name: ESG Investing
course.description: This course will discuss the market terminology, practices, usages and impact of ESG factors and climate risk with focus on materiality. The course will empower the students with cutting-edge information, tools, applications and solid research on the subject. Industry experts will bring valuable insights into this fast-growing field of finance. Students will take charge of their learning by presenting industry cases, undertaking market research and providing in-depth cross-regional analysis on Sustainability/ESG Investing.
